test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-9
test-case.Creator: Michael Kay
test-case.description: Copy namespace sensitive attribute content: see bug 4151. This test succeeds: a namespace-sensitive element can be copied if copy-namespaces=preserve, and its namespace-sensitive attribute can be copied if its parent element is copied
